alert.note: Alert for Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walthall County through 430 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tylertown, or 7 miles west of Kokomo, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tylertown and Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
